name: LGND
description:
With a pistol with a grappling attachment, some broken physics and maybe a bit of luck, can you reach it to the end without literally being blown to pieces?

Welcome to LGND.

LGND is an FPS Platformer that involves exploring a level and killing all enemies inside and destroying the end goal.

The game is designed to be fast paced, with you moving from position to position to avoid your location getting overrun by enemies

This absolute hellish nightmare of game includes

- 4 Levels with an Easy, Normal and Hard difficulty (different music per difficulty)

- 4 Unique Enemies, each with their own strengths and weaknesses

- A 17 Song Soundtrack with beats of varying intensity
